channel.title: CVE Feed for WP Bannerize -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WP Bannerize -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-39351|2024-08-04T02:06:42.261Z -- wp%20bannerize -- wp%20bannerize
item.description: The WP Bannerize WordPress plugin is vulnerable to authenticated SQL injection via the id parameter found in the ~/Classes/wpBannerizeAdmin.php file which allows attackers to exfiltrate sensitive information from vulnerable sites. This issue affects versions 2.0.0 - 4.0.2.
